name: moneybird
title: Moneybird
description: Quickly add new time entries to your Moneybird administration
author: janyk

commands.name: record-hours
commands.title: New Time Entry
commands.subtitle: Moneybird Time Tracking
commands.description: Add a new time entry to your administration

commands.name: start-timing
commands.title: Mark Now as Start Time
commands.subtitle: Moneybird Time Tracking
commands.description: Mark the current date and time as future start point for a new time entry

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
